attributes.action: JOHN MAYNARD WILLIAMS..CAPTAIN ROYAL ATRILLERY RETIRED.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir I was appalled to see that consideration is being given to give Terroists and Murders compensation for there endeavors during the TROUBLES.. 
How much are you considering giving the families of all the British Soldiers that laid down their lives at the governments request. In short this can only be described as SICK.Keep the money to help Pensioners or people out of work.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
